Definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
Synonyms: Diagnosed EXACT|DIAGNOSIS EXACT|DIAGNOSIS EXACT|Diagnosis EXACT|Diagnosis EXACT|Diagnosis EXACT|Diagnosis EXACT|diagnosis EXACT|diagnosis EXACT|diagnosis EXACT|Diagnostic EXACT|Diagnostic EXACT|Dx EXACT

Definition: A standardized rating scale developed by John C. Morris in 1997 to evaluate the severity of an individual's cognitive impairment. This instrument contains 6 areas which include memory, orientation, judgment and problem solving, community affairs, home and hobbies, and personal care. Each item is rated on a scale from 0 to 3 with 0 being none and 3 being severe.
Synonyms: CDR EXACT|CDR EXACT|CDR01 EXACT|Clinical Dementia Rating Questionnaire EXACT

Definition: Clinical Dementia Rating (CDR) Sum of Boxes.
Synonyms: CDR - Sum of Boxes EXACT|CDR01-Sum of Boxes EXACT|CDR01-Sum of Boxes EXACT|CDR0107 EXACT
Feature: Clinical Dementia Rating Scale Sum of Boxes (CDRSB)
IGNORE: Clinical Dementia Rating Scale Sum of Boxes

Synonyms: MMS1-Total Score EXACT|MMS1-Total Score EXACT|MMS112 EXACT|MMSE - Total Score EXACT

Definition: A standardized rating scale developed by Ziad Nasreddine in 1996 to screen for mild cognitive dysfunction and impairment. This instrument assesses the following cognitive domains: attention and concentration, executive functions, memory, language, visuoconstructional skills, conceptual thinking, calculations, and orientation.
Synonyms: MOCA EXACT|MOCA EXACT|MOCA01 EXACT|Montreal Cognitive Assessment EXACT|Montreal Cognitive Assessment Functional Test EXACT

Definition: Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form total score.
Synonyms: GDS02-Total Score - Analysis EXACT|GDS02-Total Score - Analysis EXACT|GDS02TS EXACT|Geriatric Depression Scale Short Form - Total Score EXACT

Definition: Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale-Cognitive CDISC Version (ADAS-Cog CDISC Version) Word recognition task for word 11 Trials 1, 2, 3.
Synonyms: ADCRGW11 EXACT|CDISC ADAS-Cog - Word Recognition: Word 11 EXACT|Word Recognition: Word [11] EXACT|Word Recognition: Word [11] EXACT

Definition: Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale-Cognitive CDISC Version (ADAS-Cog CDISC Version) Word recognition task for word 13 Trials 1, 2, 3.
Synonyms: ADCRGW13 EXACT|CDISC ADAS-Cog - Word Recognition: Word 13 EXACT|Word Recognition: Word [13] EXACT|Word Recognition: Word [13] EXACT
IGNORE: ADAS-Cog-13, which includes all ADAS-Cog-11 items as well as a test of delayed word recall and a number cancellation or maze task. ADAS-Cog-13 scores range from 0 to 85.

Synonyms: FAQ - Total Score EXACT|FAQ01-Total Score EXACT|FAQ01-Total Score EXACT|FAQ0111 EXACT
IGNORE: Functional Activities Questionnaire, total score = range 0-30

Definition: Neuropsychiatric Inventory (NPI) Total of (Frequency Sub-total) x (Severity Sub-total).
Synonyms: NPI - NPI Total Score EXACT|NPI1-NPI Total Score EXACT|NPI1-NPI Total Score EXACT|NPI1TOT EXACT

Definition: A standardized rating scale originally developed and copyrighted by Jeffrey L. Cummings in 1994 as well as published in the journal Neurology (Cummings J.L., The Neuropsychiatric Inventory: Assessing psychopathology in dementia patients. Neurology May 1997 48:10S-16S) which is used to assess the severity of an individual's neuropathic behaviors based on a observations made by the patient's caregiver. This instrument contains 12 neuropsychiatric areas associated with dementia such as delusions, anxiety, motor disturbances, and appetite. Each behavior is evaluated only if the individual displays the behavior. For these behaviors, the frequency is assessed on a scale of 0-4 with 0 being occasionally and 4 being very frequently, the severity is assessed on a scale of 1-3 with 1 being mild and 3 being marked, and the level of distress each behavior inflicts on the caregiver is assessed on a scale of 0-5 with 0 being not distressing and 5 being extremely distressing.
Synonyms: Neuropsychiatric Inventory Questionnaire EXACT|Neuropsychiatric Inventory-Questionnaire EXACT|NPI EXACT|NPI-Q EXACT|NPI1 EXACT

Definition: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) Total score depression.

Feature: Rey Complex Figure Test and Recognition Trial (RCFT)
IGNORE: Rey Complex Figure Test and Recognition Trial, 0-36 points. The RCFT standardizes the materials and procedures for administering the Rey complex figure, measures recognition memory for the elements of the Rey complex figure, and assesses the respondent’s ability to use cues to retrieve information.

Feature: Repeatable Battery for the Assessment of Neuropsychological Status (RBANS)
IGNORE: Repeatable Battery for the Assessment of Neuropsychological Status, total score = 40–160

Definition: A self-rated questionnaire which assesses sleep quality and disturbances over a one month time interval.
Synonyms: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index EXACT|Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index EXACT|Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index (PSQI) SF-10 EXACT|PSQI EXACT|PSQI EXACT|PSQI1 EXACT
